divs: Sighting DetailsStand on the front porch looking west,this is when the object caught my eye. at first thought it was a plane,that's when it moved to fast and stopped for a while then took off at high speed to the North West.
Summary: flashing lights, yellow,green,red,blue and orange. changed direction to the n/w at high speed.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Xenia
There were no other sightings in Xenia on or around September 10th 2012
